backend/DirectionType.mo: Defines an enum-like type for direction values: up or down.
backend/main.mo: Actor managing market data, user preferences, snapshots, and filtering with caching and staleness checks.
backend/MarketData.mo: Defines market data structure including symbol, price, volume, and direction.
backend/Theme.mo: Defines a theme type with darkNeon and cyberGlow variants.
backend/UserPreferences.mo: Defines user preferences including favourites, theme, alerts, language, and input type with principal.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing UI update features, affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing summarized descriptions of multiple frontend files and components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with full PWA meta tags, icons, splash screens, and iOS standalone settings.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, shortcuts, screenshots, and display settings.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker v9 handling asset caching, activation cleanup, and fetch logic for offline support.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component managing tabs, service worker updates, learning engine init, URL sync, and global layout.
frontend/src/components/AIPerformancePan: Displays AI learning stats for an asset or top assets, loading data from the learning engine with compact and full modes.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: Error boundary that catches UI errors, shows detailed error info, detects cache mismatch, and allows clearing caches and reloading.
frontend/src/components/AssetResearch.ts: Asset research tool with Binance symbol search, autocomplete, and detailed asset data display using live and cached data.
frontend/src/components/DataStatusIndica: Shows live data fetch status, stale data warnings, and error details with retry option based on useDataStatus.
frontend/src/components/DynamicAlerts.ts: Generates temporary radar and recommendation alerts with deduping, auto-dismiss, and local preference control.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a styled footer with a heart icon and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with logo, title, and PWA install buttons controlled by install state.
frontend/src/components/ICPAnalysis.tsx: Fetches and displays detailed ICP market analysis with dynamic styling based on price direction.
frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.ts: Shows a timed PWA install prompt with dismiss and dialog controls, including iOS-specific messaging.
frontend/src/components/MarketCard.tsx: Visual card for a single market showing price, change, volume, and confidence with interactive selection.
frontend/src/components/MarketOverview.t: Fetches and displays a scrollable list of market cards and detailed view for the selected symbol.
frontend/src/components/MarketSnapshotDi: Empty placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/Opportunities.ts: Loads and displays trading opportunities by modality with tabs, icons, and scrollable lists.
frontend/src/components/PredictiveConfid: Renders a confidence indicator for technical analysis predictions with dynamic gradients and compact or full layouts.
frontend/src/components/PWADiagnosticsVi: Displays detailed PWA diagnostics such as display mode, install prompt status, and technical readiness using data from usePWADiagnostics.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallDialog: Provides a modal dialog for installing the PWA, with platform‑specific instructions and a trigger for the install prompt.
frontend/src/components/PWAInstallStatus: Shows current PWA installation state, installability, device support, and options to trigger installation.
frontend/src/components/RadarDashboard.t: Displays real‑time radar alerts, filters, and enriched market data for anomalies and learning signals.
frontend/src/components/ResetFromScratch: Implements a confirmation dialog for wiping all local data and reloading the app from a clean state.
frontend/src/components/TabFetchErrorSta: Displays an error card with details and reload action, including special handling for PWA cache-related errors.
frontend/src/components/TabPageCard.tsx: Renders a styled card layout for tab pages with icon, title, description, and content slot.
frontend/src/components/ThemeProvider.ts: Provides theme context and manages theme persistence and class updates for darkNeon or cyberGlow modes.
frontend/src/components/TopRecommendatio: Fetches market data and AI recommendations, showing loading, error, or a scrollable list of ranked asset recommendations.
User settings panel for theme, alerts, favorites, learning priorities, and PWA tools with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/analysisEnric: Computes advanced technical analysis including trend, strength, prediction, confidence, manipulation zones, and learning-engine enhancements.
Fetches Binance Futures market data and individual tickers with error handling and includes a filter for major trading pairs.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/binanceFuture: Provides functions to fetch Binance Futures funding rates and open interest with partial-failure tolerance and maintains in-memory historical metrics.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/learningInteg: Records and updates learning-engine predictions, optionally prioritizing favourite symbols and applying confidence thresholds.
Generates recommendations and detects market anomalies such as volatility, funding irregularities, and open interest spikes.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/opportunityRu: Implements deterministic scoring rules to select scalping and swing trading opportunities from market data.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/unifiedSnapsh: Transforms backend unified snapshots into enriched BinanceMarketData with safe numeric parsing and technical analysis.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, handling AuthClient creation, login, logout, and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useOpportunities.ts: Computes trading opportunities from Binance market data using several rule selectors and exposes them via a react-query hook.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWADiagnostics.ts: Runs diagnostics on PWA readiness by checking display mode, install prompt, service worker, manifest, and critical icons, returning a structured status report.
frontend/src/hooks/usePWAInstall.ts: Manages PWA installability state, handling beforeinstallprompt, installation status, display mode changes, and user dismissal tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exposes react-query hooks for Binance market data, technical analysis enrichment, learning prioritization, and related data types and utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useServiceWorkerUpdat: Detects service worker updates, tracks waiting workers, and provides a trigger to activate updates and reload the app.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for themes including dark, neon, and cyber glow, plus global resets and animated gradient backgrounds.
frontend/src/lib/learningEngine.ts: Implements an IndexedDB‑backed learning engine for storing prediction records, maintaining asset learning stats, and managing adaptive config.
frontend/src/lib/resetFromScratch.ts: Provides full reset utilities that clear IndexedDB, caches, service workers, and localStorage, exposing helpers to run and detect resets.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the Internet Identity provider before rendering the main App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom color tokens, neon palettes, container settings, animations, and theme extensions driven by CSS variables.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, including features, requests, and metadata for UI unification work on the Radar and Trading Opportunities tabs.
